text: Ron Perlman (born April 13, 1950) is an American actor. He is best known for his work as Hellboy in Hellboy and in Hellboy II: The Golden Army. He won a Golden Globe Award in 1988 for his role as Vincent in Beauty and the Beast (1987–1990). He was born in New York City, New York.Ron Perlman Biography (1949–) and studied at the University of Minnesota. He has been married to Opal Perlamn since 1981.
